description: Number of (not necessarily distinct) nonsquarefree numbers among C(n,k), k=0..n.
comments: Number of nonsquarefree numbers (A013929) on row n of Pascal's triangle (A007318). - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 05 2014
links: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
formula: From _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 05 2014: (Start)a(n) = 1 + n - A048276(n).Also, for all n >= 0:a(n) >= A249732(n).a(n) >= A249733(n).(End)
mathematica: f[ n_ ] := (c = 0; k = 1; While[ k < n, If[ Union[ Transpose[ FactorInteger[ Binomial[ n, k ] ] ] [ [ 2 ] ] ] [ [ -1 ] ] > 1, c++ ]; k++ ]; c); Table[ f[ n ], {n, 0, 75} ]Table[(1 + n) - Length[Select[Binomial[n, Range[0, n]], SquareFreeQ[#] &]], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 06 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, !issquarefree(binomial(n, k))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 05 2014(PARI)A048277(n) = sum(k=0,n\2,((0==moebius(binomial(n,k)))*(if(k<(n/2),2,1))));for(n=0, 8192, write("b048277.txt", n, " ", A048277(n))); \\ b-file was computed with this program. - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 05 2014
author: _Labos Elemer_
